      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Checks if a move puts the king in check
      void ChessBoard.queenPiece(Square s)
      Brings up a modality panel where the user can choose what piece they would like to make the pawn being queened into
      void ChessBoard.setMoving(Square s)
      Set what Square holds a moving piece
      void ChessBoard.setupForMove(Square pieceMoving)
      Takes a parameter of a Square and selects it, showing the legal moves that it can make (enabled the board in those places)
      static boolean ChessBoard.takesOutOfCheck(Square origin, Square destination, Square[][] board)
      Checks if the hypothetical move from Square origin to Square destination takes the king out of check If the method returns false, that would mean the piece is putting or puts the king into check.
      static boolean ChessBoard.takesOutOfCheck(Square origin, Square destination, Square[][] board)
      Checks if the hypothetical move from Square origin to Square destination takes the king out of check If the method returns false, that would mean the piece is putting or puts the king into check.
